mapper.sql: id, companyCode, productCode, companyName, companyShortName, companyLogo, companyAddress, zipCode, contactPhone, contactFax, contactPerson, email, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_company ( companyCode, productCode, companyName, companyShortName, companyLogo, companyAddress, zipCode, contactPhone, contactFax, contactPerson, email, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{companyCode}, #{productCode}, #{companyName}, #{companyShortName}, #{companyLogo}, #{companyAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactFax}, #{contactPerson}, #{email}, #{status}, #{seqSort}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_company
companyCode = #{companyCode},
productCode = #{productCode},
companyName = #{companyName},
companyShortName = #{companyShortName},
companyLogo = #{companyLogo},
companyAddress = #{companyAddress},
zipCode = #{zipCode},
contactPhone = #{contactPhone},
contactFax = #{contactFax},
contactPerson = #{contactPerson},
email = #{email},
status = #{status},
seqSort = #{seqSort},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_company
companyCode = #{map.companyCode},
productCode = #{map.productCode},
companyName = #{map.companyName},
companyShortName = #{map.companyShortName},
companyLogo = #{map.companyLogo},
companyAddress = #{map.companyAddress},
zipCode = #{map.zipCode},
contactPhone = #{map.contactPhone},
contactFax = #{map.contactFax},
contactPerson = #{map.contactPerson},
email = #{map.email},
status = #{map.status},
seqSort = #{map.seqSort},
description = #{map.description},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_company ( companyCode, productCode, companyName, companyShortName, companyLogo, companyAddress, zipCode, contactPhone, contactFax, contactPerson, email, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.companyCode}, #{map.productCode}, #{map.companyName}, #{map.companyShortName}, #{map.companyLogo}, #{map.companyAddress}, #{map.zipCode}, #{map.contactPhone}, #{map.contactFax}, #{map.contactPerson}, #{map.email}, #{map.status}, #{map.seqSort}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_company
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND companyCode like CONCAT('%', #{companyCode} , '%')
AND productCode like CONCAT('%', #{productCode} , '%')
AND companyName like CONCAT('%', #{companyName} , '%')
AND companyShortName like CONCAT('%', #{companyShortName} , '%')
AND companyLogo like CONCAT('%', #{companyLogo} , '%')
AND companyAddress like CONCAT('%', #{companyAddress} , '%')
AND zipCode like CONCAT('%', #{zipCode} , '%')
AND contactPhone like CONCAT('%', #{contactPhone} , '%')
AND contactFax like CONCAT('%', #{contactFax} , '%')
AND contactPerson like CONCAT('%', #{contactPerson} , '%')
AND email like CONCAT('%', #{email} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND seqSort like CONCAT('%', #{seqSort} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
